Drug Abuse and Traffic

Cocaine and Crack Cocaine
organizations: State University of New York at Binghamton
lead_paragraph: Binghamton dismissed Emanuel Mayben from its basketball team in the wake of his arrest on charges of sale and possession of cocaine.
snippet: Binghamton dismissed Emanuel Mayben from its basketball team in the wake of his arrest on charges of sale and possession of cocaine.
